name: HowtoTalktoGenZ
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Each day we go over a piece of advice, tip, or other applicable method to talk to Gen Z. This is proven to work because it was created by a member of Gen Z with parents in mind. We know how difficult it can be sometimes to communicate and understand your kid in today's world. That's why we have put together this helpful tool to give you a new tool each day to make progress with your child.
